content: the long cat door draft stopper is a fun way to dress up a plain draft stopper and create an adorable custom gift - made with bernat blanket grab the colors to match your favorite feline friend and whip one up with this crochet pattern on moogly the long cat door draft stopper crochet pattern is perfect for intermediate crocheters looking to add a touch of whimsy to their home decor this one-size pattern features a seamless construction worked in the round using tapestry crochet technique but only when needed creating a charming and functional piece with clear written instructions and a video tutorial available crafters of all skill levels can enjoy making this adorable draft stopper
